titles.title: Single Asset Bankruptcy Reform Act of 1997
To amend section 101 of title 11 of the United States Code to modify the definition of single asset real estate and to make technical corrections.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commercial and Administrative Law.

bill.summary: 1/7/1997--Introduced. Single Asset Bankruptcy Reform Act of 1997 - Amends Federal bankruptcy law to remove the $4 million ceiling on aggregate noncontingent, liquidated secured debts from the definition of single asset real estate.
